About the Company: Atlanta Ltd has a deep rooted presence in three of the country`s fastest growing segments mainly infrastructure development, mining and realty.Being a value-focused and asset-based company, Atlanta embarks on wealth-based projects across all lines of business with consistent revenue generation potential.The company has serviced some of the biggest players in the industry such as National Highway Authority of India (NHAI), Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Public Works Department, Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai and Airports Authority of India, to name a few.The company is currently executing two toll-based BOT projects -- Mumbra Bypass (which is nearing completion) and Nagpur-Kondhali along with several other EPC projects.
